Class PmWiki2MediaWikiConverter

java.lang.Object
  PmWiki2MediaWikiConverter

public class PmWiki2MediaWikiConverter
extends java.lang.Object

PmWiki2MediaWikiConverter is the class to handle conversion of PmWiki syntax to MediaWiki syntax.

Author:
Johannes Perl

public static java.lang.String replaceAttachmentLinks(java.lang.String text)
Converts all attachment links of PmWiki to attachment links of MediaWiki.

Conversion:
Attach:image.jpeg => [[Bild:image.jpeg]]

text - the text to convert
Returns:
the converted text

replaceFileLinks

public static java.lang.String replaceFileLinks(java.lang.String text)
Converts all file links of PmWiki to file links of MediaWiki.

Conversion:
[[file://c:/windows/ | windows]] | [[file:\\c:/windows/ | windows]] => [file://c:/windows/ windows]

Parameters:
text - the text to convert
Returns:
the converted text
